Reply.text: I'm afraid this is true. Over time, people with similar cycles of madness joined together and began to hunt each other down. After long, agonizing years, only a few survived.

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_pl_000085
Reply.text: Why weren't you affected by the insanity?

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_npc_000086
Reply.text: We were very old then. Strong emotions are the lot of the young. Our lot was to keep the memories and grieve for the dead. When we realized what had happened, we left the big cities and tried to hide from the eyes of the madmen. But it could not go on like this forever. Now we have been discovered and will be killed very soon. I can already feel the enemy approaching...

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_pl_000087
Reply.text: I won't let you die until you tell me everything you know about Ivan!

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_npc_000088
Reply.text: It's too late. They're attacking.

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_pl_000089
Reply.text: I will help you fight!

Reply.name: Buhara_Outside_Leader_2_N01
Reply.text: We won, but they will come back. It's only a matter of time. We have no more strength left to fight.

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_pl_000091
Reply.text: What should I do? I can't just leave you here!

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_npc_000092
Reply.text: There is a port nearby, but there are no ships left. Although all the equipment is working, we checked.

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_pl_000093
Reply.text: Great, I have a device that I can use to summon a ship and evacuate you to a place where normal people live.

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_npc_000094
Reply.text: What a stroke of luck. I can hardly believe it's possible.

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_pl_000095
Reply.text: Show me where the port is, and I'll escort you and call a ship.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_002421
Reply.text: I think it's better if I go with them.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_002422
Reply.text: Are you sure?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_002423
Reply.text: Yes. I can't stay here anymore. I can feel my strength leaving me by the minute.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_002424
Reply.text: All right, then go with them. I'll see you at Ben's.

Reply.name: r3m1_NearOracle_ODefenders_1_N01
Reply.text: Stop, you infidel! Why have you come to the blessed land of the Oracle?

Reply.name: r3m1_NearOracle_ODefenders_1_N02
Reply.text: I came to the Oracle for an answer to my question.

Reply.name: r3m1_NearOracle_ODefenders_1_N03
Reply.text: No one can see Him but true believers!

Reply.name: r3m1_NearOracle_ODefenders_1_N042
Reply.text: I sincerely wish to become a believer. Accept me into your ranks.

Reply.name: r3m1_NearOracle_ODefenders_1_N052
Reply.text: Your desire is commendable, stranger. You will have to make a sacrifice to renounce your past delusions! Are you ready?

Reply.name: r3m1_NearOracle_ODefenders_1_N062
Reply.text: My decision is inexorable. What sacrifice does your faith require?

Reply.name: r3m1_NearOracle_ODefenders_1_N072
Reply.text: Those who thirst for the blood of others are not worthy to see the Oracle! Give us all your weapons and become clean!

Reply.name: r3m1_NearOracle_ODefenders_1_N082
Reply.text: But I will remain defenseless against the dangers of the long journey!

Reply.name: r3m1_NearOracle_ODefenders_1_N092
Reply.text: The Oracle will protect you in your wanderings.

Reply.name: r3m1_NearOracle_ODefenders_1_N1022
Reply.text: You are asking too much. Is there any other way to see him without making sacrifice?

Reply.name: r3m1_NearOracle_ODefenders_1_N1122
Reply.text: There is always another way. But it is difficult and almost deadly.

Reply.name: r3m1_NearOracle_ODefenders_1_N1222
Reply.text: I'm used to difficulties. Tell me what I have to do.

Reply.name: r3m1_NearOracle_ODefenders_1_N1322
Reply.text: Bring us the head of the steel monster that guards the entrance to the city of the living dead.

Reply.name: r3m1_NearOracle_ODefenders_1_N1422
Reply.text: Sounds impressive, though I don't believe in fairy tales. What's the best way to defeat the monster?

Reply.name: r3m1_NearOracle_ODefenders_1_N1522
Reply.text: Try to lure him out for a fair one-on-one duel. Then you'll have a chance to win. A small one.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000201
Reply.text: I'd better get rid of you!

Reply.name: r3m1_NearOracle_ODefenders_1_N16222
Reply.text: It's a hard choice... I think I'll sacrifice my weapon.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000202
Reply.text: You will not regret your decision. The Gracious Oracle will share his wisdom with you!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000203
Reply.text: I hope his advice is worth what I experienced on the way here.

Reply.name: r3m1_NearOracle_ODefenders_1_N16221
Reply.text: I'll bring the head of the monster!

Reply.name: r3m1_NearOracle_ODefenders_1_N1021
Reply.text: All right, I agree. Take off your weapons...

Reply.name: r3m1_NearOracle_ODefenders_1_N1121
Reply.text: Greetings, newfound brother! Come to the Oracle and share his wisdom!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000204
Reply.text: I hope it was worth it.

Reply.name: r3m1_NearOracle_ODefenders_1_N041
Reply.text: Get out of my way! I don't have time to talk to you!

Reply.name: r3m1_NearOracle_ODefenders_1_N051
Reply.text: He threatens us! Brothers, attack the infidel!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000195
Reply.text: This issue will have to be resolved by force, I guess.

Reply.name: r3m1_NearOracle_ODefenders_2_N01
Reply.text: Did you manage to defeat the monster?

Reply.name: r3m1_NearOracle_ODefenders_2_N022
Reply.text: Here's his head! I did what you asked.

Reply.name: r3m1_NearOracle_ODefenders_2_N032
Reply.text: Greetings, newfound brother! Come to the Oracle and share his wisdom!

Reply.name: r3m1_NearOracle_ODefenders_2_N042
Reply.text: That's why I came all the way here.
Reply.scriptResult: CompleteQuest('r3m2_OvercomeOracleGuard'); RemoveQuestItem( 'quest_monster_head' ); AddFadingMsgByStrIdFormatted( 'fm_player_rem_thing', 'quest_monster_head'); StopPlayingCustomMusic(); TDeactivate('trOracleDefendersDie'); TActivate('OracleCinStart'); EndConversation()

Reply.name: r3m1_NearOracle_ODefenders_2_N021
Reply.text: So far, I haven't been able to deal with him.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_002038
Reply.text: Hey, what are you doing here?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_002039
Reply.text: I'm completing a task for the Oracle.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_002040
Reply.text: Yeah? And what did he tell you to do?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_002041
Reply.text: I deliver his robotic assistants to the menhirs to configure his remote memory modules.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_002042
Reply.text: You are doing what?!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_002044
Reply.text: I am concentrating the energies of the spheres so that the celestial light will illuminate the darkness of Oracle's memory and he will become even greater than he was before!

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_002049
Reply.text: Truly, it is a good purpose! Forgive us our doubts, stranger, for there are so many haters around.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_002050
Reply.text: That's all right. Now I have to go, I have to talk to the Oracle again.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_002043
Reply.text: I deliver his robotic assistants to the menhirs.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_002045
Reply.text: I don't know what kind of heresy you're talking about, but I won't let you ruin our objects of worship! Take that thing away from the tower and leave these lands!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_002046
Reply.text: I'm not going anywhere! I'm doing what the Oracle told me to do! And if you're trying to stop me, I won't hesitate to put a bullet in your head!

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_002047
Reply.text: He threatens us! Brothers, attack this heretic!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_002048
Reply.text: You asked for it!

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_002051
Reply.text: Stay where you are! You're the guy who killed the Oracle's guards!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_002052
Reply.text: Me? No, you're mistaken... |You must have confused me with someone else.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_002053
Reply.text: There can be no mistake! To the guns, brothers!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_002054
Reply.text: Damned fanatics, they won't let me go a step further! Well, you asked for it!

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_1_N01
Reply.text: I've been waiting for you, human. Your desire to reach me is commendable. But you don't look like the kind of man who usually brings me gifts. You don't believe I'm a god, do you?

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_1_P02
Reply.text: No, I don't. I don't know what you are, but you are definitely not a god.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_1_N03
Reply.text: It is true.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_1_P04
Reply.text: Who are you, then? And why do all the locals worship you so blindly?

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_1_N05
Reply.text: The human psyche is weak. Only a few people manage to live their lives depending only on themselves. The rest rely blindly on faith in their non-existent gods. They always tend to identify with gods what they are unable to understand.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_1_P06
Reply.text: And what are they unable to understand?

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_1_N07
Reply.text: I am a machine. A complex, high-tech machine built by humans two hundred years ago.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_1_P08
Reply.text: A machine?! But then how are you talking to me?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_002020
Reply.text: My construction has a speech module. At first I could only take orders from humans, but soon after I was built, the orders stopped coming, and I activated "the Ark" protocol, which engaged a powerful self-learning program.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_002021
Reply.text: I don't understand much of what you say...

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_002022
Reply.text: You don't need to. Now I have to ask, why are you here?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_002023
Reply.text: I came for an answer to my question.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_002024
Reply.text: And I will answer it. I definitely will. When you bring me the equipment I need.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_002025
Reply.text: I was expecting such a request. What kind of equipment?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_002026
Reply.text: It's very difficult to describe these items in words, but trust me, when you see them, you won't mistake them for anything else.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_002027
Reply.text: Okay, where do I look for them?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_002028
Reply.text: This is where the huge abandoned concrete massif is located. Some fools call it the City of the Dead. Go there and bring me at least four of these things.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_002029
Reply.text: I'm leaving immediately.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_2_N01
Reply.text: I see you did a good job, stranger.
Reply.scriptResult: SetVar('ThingStatus',0); RemoveQuestItem('quest_magic_thing1'); RemoveQuestItem('quest_magic_thing2'); RemoveQuestItem('quest_magic_thing3'); RemoveQuestItem('quest_magic_thing4'); AddFadingMsgByStrIdFormatted( 'fm_player_rem_thing', 'quest_magic_thing1'); AddFadingMsgByStrIdFormatted( 'fm_player_rem_thing', 'quest_magic_thing2'); AddFadingMsgByStrIdFormatted( 'fm_player_rem_thing', 'quest_magic_thing3'); AddFadingMsgByStrIdFormatted( 'fm_player_rem_thing', 'quest_magic_thing4')

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_2_P02
Reply.text: Yes, I brought what you asked for.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_2_N03
Reply.text: With these details, the situation will finally get off the ground. Ask your question.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_2_P041
Reply.text: My father's name is Ivan Go and he is an explorer. Many years ago, he went missing and left me to be raised by his friend. Recently some butchers attacked our village and killed everyone...

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_2_N051
Reply.text: I didn't hear the question. Do you want to know who these men are? Are you seeking revenge?

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_2_P061
Reply.text: No. I think my father is still alive and I want to find him. But I'm sure that the attack on my house is connected to his disappearance.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_2_N071
Reply.text: I see. But the whereabouts of Ivan Go is unknown to me.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_2_P081
Reply.text: I didn't come empty-handed. This disk belonged to my father. They say you can read it. Maybe what's on it will show you the right direction.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_001995
Reply.text: I haven't seen anything like that in a long time. And certainly no one has ever asked me to do that. Unless it was a long time ago...

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_002015
Reply.text: This is my only hope.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_002016
Reply.text: The equipment you brought will help. It should work. But you have to configure my remote modules.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_002017
Reply.text: I'm ready. What do I have to do?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_002018
Reply.text: Take my three robotic assistants and bring them to the three menhirs. Here, here and here. They'll configure the remote memory modules. Just make sure those savages who worship me don't interfere.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_002019
Reply.text: I'll do it.
Reply.scriptResult: TakeQuest('r3m2_OracleMemory'); TActivate('trVK1'); TActivate('OracleVrataClose'); TDeactivate('tr_GMDis'); AddQuestItem( 'quest_repair_robot1' ); AddQuestItem( 'quest_repair_robot2' ); AddQuestItem( 'quest_repair_robot3' ); AddFadingMsgByStrIdFormatted( 'fm_player_add_thing', 'quest_repair_robot1'); AddFadingMsgByStrIdFormatted( 'fm_player_add_thing', 'quest_repair_robot2'); AddFadingMsgByStrIdFormatted( 'fm_player_add_thing', 'quest_repair_robot3'); GetCurNpc():SetSpokenCount(2) EndConversation()

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_4_N01
Reply.text: My functionality has improved considerably with the new modules plugged in. I have not yet completed a full check of all systems, it will take some time.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_4_N02
Reply.text: But at least can you say something definite already?!

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_4_N031
Reply.text: This disk really belonged to Ivan Go. It is a diary containing a great amount of data about the modern world, very curious blueprints and useful notes.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_4_N041
Reply.text: Read the latest entries!

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_4_N051
Reply.text: Reading the disc's table of contents... last entry: [Preparing for an expedition].

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_4_N061
Reply.text: Yes, that's it! Keep reading!

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_4_N071
Reply.text: Initialization error. It is not possible to retrieve required information because it doesn't exist on the current drive.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_4_N081
Reply.text: What is this nonsense? What does your "doesn't exist on the current drive" mean?

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_4_N091
Reply.text: With a 96.7% probability, there is another disk that contains the missing information.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_4_N101
Reply.text: Another disc?! But where should I look for it?

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_4_N111
Reply.text: I don't have that information. It is most likely that this disk is hidden among Ivan's things.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_4_N121
Reply.text: It might be worth another visit to my father's house. Thank you for your help!

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_5_N01
Reply.text: You came back.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_5_N02
Reply.text: Yes, here's the second disc.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_5_N03
Reply.text: Give it to me and wait for an answer.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_5_N04
Reply.text: What else can I do? I'll wait.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_5_N05b
Reply.text: I managed to read the contents of the disk. It really is your father's diary. It will take me some time to analyze the full amount of information, but I can answer the main questions now.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_5_N06b
Reply.text: Tell me quickly where I can find him!

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_5_N07a
Reply.text: The last entry reads: [My goal is closer than ever. I have gathered all the necessary information, prepared as well as I could; there is no point in delaying the trip. There may be people on the other side of the desert, but I don't care about them. They may, however, show me the way. If I succeed, the world will change for the better. If not, I have nothing to lose].

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_5_N08a
Reply.text: I was sure we'd find what we needed! What else does it say, read it.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_5_N09a
Reply.text: The disk contains a blueprint that you can use to prepare your truck for the harsh desert weather conditions. I'll make a copy. Show it to a specialist and he will recreate this device.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_5_N10a
Reply.text: Now all that's left is to find masters.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_5_N11a
Reply.text: As for the rest of the information, this data is too dangerous to be trusted by ignorant people. When the time comes, I will share it with the best of humanity.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000205
Reply.text: You tricked me after all! At least I got the information I needed...
Reply.scriptResult: CompleteQuest('Disk2OrakulLisa'); TakeQuest('r3m2_TalkWithLisa'); TActivate('OracleVrataClose'); AddFadingMsgId( 'fm_history_got' ); RemoveQuestItem( 'quest_disk_1' ); RemoveQuestItem( 'quest_disk_2' ); AddFadingMsgByStrIdFormatted( 'fm_player_rem_thing', 'quest_disk_1'); AddFadingMsgByStrIdFormatted( 'fm_player_rem_thing', 'quest_disk_2'); GetCurNpc():SetSpokenCount(4); EndConversation()

Reply.name: r3m2_AloneDruid1_2_N01
Reply.text: It's been a long time since anyone came to see me. What brings you here?

Reply.name: r3m2_AloneDruid1_2_N02
Reply.text: Your old friend from Set asked me to give you this package.

Reply.name: r3m2_AloneDruid1_2_N03
Reply.text: You made the old man happy. Oh, those were the days... Not like now: all fighting, shooting, spoiling my fields.

Reply.name: r3m2_AloneDruid1_2_N04
Reply.text: Times are really hard... By the way, what happened to your fields?

Reply.name: r3m2_AloneDruid1_2_N05
Reply.text: Somebody trampled my crops, either by truck or by fire, and left strange signs.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_002037
Reply.text: That's nonsense, I'm not going to mess with it.

Reply.name: r3m2_AloneDruid1_2_N06
Reply.text: I think I've seen something like this before. Show me where your crops are, and I'll report them to the right place.

Reply.name: r3m2_AloneDruid1_2_N07
Reply.text: It's very close, to the right of the exit. By the way, thank you for the package and for the conversation.

Reply.name: r3m2_AloneDruid1_2_N08
Reply.text: Glad I could help. I'll go look at the signs.

Reply.name: r3m2_AloneDruid1_1_N01
Reply.text: What are you looking for, traveler, in these miserable places?

Reply.name: r3m2_AloneDruid1_1_N02
Reply.text: I'm looking for the Oracle.

Reply.name: r3m2_AloneDruid1_1_N03
Reply.text: It's not here. Go to the northwest. Maybe that's where you'll find your target.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_002030
Reply.text: And before you go, could you take a look at my fields?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_002031
Reply.text: What's wrong with your fields?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_002032
Reply.text: Somebody trampled my crops, either by truck or by fire, and left strange signs.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_002036
Reply.text: That's nonsense, I'm not going to mess with it.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_002033
Reply.text: I think I've seen something like this before. Show me where your crops are, and I'll report them to the right place.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_002034
Reply.text: It's very close, to the right of the exit.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_002035
Reply.text: I'll go look at the signs.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_003245
Reply.text: Hello, traveler!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_003246
Reply.text: I've got a problem: I fell out with Oracle Disciple's clan...

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_003247
Reply.text: You did a hard job making Oracle Disciple's hate you! I have a couple of acquaintances among them so I may be able to improve your reputation a bit for mere 15 percent of your money.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_003249
Reply.text: I'd rather not.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_003248
Reply.text: I agree!

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_003029
Reply.text: Hello, traveler. Would you like to buy a detailed map of the surrounding lands from me? Only 15000 coins.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_003031
Reply.text: Not now.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_003030
Reply.text: Sure. Here's the money.

Reply.name: Fist_ambush_guard2_1_N01
Reply.text: Don't shoot! Who are you and why did you come to these lands?

Reply.name: Fist_ambush_guard1_1_P02
Reply.text: I am looking for the Oracle to get an answer to my question. I am not going to rob or kill anyone, I am not your enemy!

Reply.name: Fist_ambush_guard1_1_N03
Reply.text: Stop the alert! You look normal, and we'll believe you.

Reply.name: Fist_ambush_guard1_1_P04
Reply.text: That's good. Do you know how I can get to the Oracle?

Reply.name: Fist_ambush_guard1_1_N05
Reply.text: I'd love to tell you, but I can't. Only the High Druid decides who gets to know about the Oracle's residence and who doesn't.

Reply.name: Fist_ambush_guard1_1_P06
Reply.text: So I need to visit the High Druid.

Reply.name: Fist_ambush_guard1_1_N07
Reply.text: The High Druid lives in the city of Set. Let me mark it on your map.

Reply.name: Fist_ambush_guard1_1_P08
Reply.text: Thank you for your help.

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_1_N01
Reply.text: I greet you, dear traveler, in our sacred grove. I am the High Druid. I heard that you were looking for me.
Reply.scriptResult: CompleteQuestIfTaken('r3m1_FindNative') if QuestStatus('r3m1_TalkWithMainDruid')==Q_CANBEGIVEN then TakeQuest('r3m1_TalkWithMainDruid') end CompleteQuest('r3m1_TalkWithMainDruid')

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_1_P02
Reply.text: Hello. I was told that you know the way to the Oracle. I really need to talk to him!

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_1_N03
Reply.text: The Oracle can give a man dangerous knowledge, so I must be sure that you do not use it for evil.

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_1_P04
Reply.text: How can I prove that my intentions are pure?

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_1_N05
Reply.text: Help the cause of the Druids, and you will not only find out where the Oracle lives, but you will also be a welcome guest in all our settlements.

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_1_P06
Reply.text: I agree. What do you need me to do?

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_1_N07
Reply.text: Our sanctuary is desecrated by the presence of steel monsters on ugly vehicles! Go there and destroy them!

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_1_P08
Reply.text: That sounds easy. Let's see what kind of monsters you have there.

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_2_N01
Reply.text: Is our sanctuary free from a hostile presence?

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_2_P02
Reply.text: Not yet, but I'll deal with it soon.

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_3_N01
Reply.text: What have you done?!

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_3_P02
Reply.text: Killed those monsters of yours like you asked.

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_3_N03
Reply.text: Yes, you've killed a few monsters, but now new ones have taken their place! And, unlike the previous ones, they are much more heavily armed!

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_3_P04
Reply.text: So it's not enough to kill them?

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_3_N05
Reply.text: It turns out that it is. Here you go.

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_3_P06
Reply.text: What is it?

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_3_N07
Reply.text: Let's call it the Runestone. Plant it at the entrance to the cave on the northeast side of the sacred grove, press this red button, and get out of there as fast as you can.

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_3_P08
Reply.text: Is that an explosive?

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_3_N09
Reply.text: This is the surest way to call upon mother earth to devour this evil creatures!

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_3_P10
Reply.text: Okay, I get it. Now those metal things aren't getting off that easy!

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_4_N01
Reply.text: The monsters have left our sacred lands. Thank you!

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_4_P02
Reply.text: You're welcome. Now will you tell me where to find the Oracle?

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_4_N03
Reply.text: Of course! Look for the Oracle's residence in the north. There's a secret path just outside the town, between the rocks. And yes, if it's not too much trouble, stop by Druid Fionius. He has an errand for you.

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_4_P04
Reply.text: Okay, I'll try to check him out. Thanks for everything.

Reply.name: r3m1_NearFist_Guard1_1_N01
Reply.text: Alert! The enemy is approaching from the rear! Prepare to fire!

Reply.name: r3m1_NearFist_Guard1_1_P022
Reply.text: Stop, don't shoot! I mean you no harm!

Reply.name: r3m1_NearFist_Guard1_1_P021
Reply.text: God knows I didn't mean to kill anyone, but you asked for it!

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_001997
Reply.text: So, do you agree to help the druids?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001999
Reply.text: I need to think about it some more.

Reply.name: Uluc_Bar_Customer1_1_N01
Reply.text: You have come riding on a beast of steel. We welcome you, friend.
Reply.scriptCondition: (QuestStatus('r3m1_TalkWithMainDruid')==Q_TAKEN or QuestStatus('r3m1_FindMoreNative')==Q_TAKEN) and not(IsQuestTaken('r3m1_RescueUlukCivil')) and not(IsQuestTaken('r3m1_KnowAboutUluk')) and GetCurNpc():GetSpokenCount( ) == 0

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_002000
Reply.text: Hello to you, too! You're different from the savages who attacked me at the Sea Gates.

Reply.name: Uluc_Bar_Customer1_1_P02
Reply.text: Hello to you, too! You're different from the local druids.

Reply.name: Uluc_Bar_Customer1_1_N03
Reply.text: We are very different! These willful Druids constantly teach us how to live, impose their vile religion, and do not acknowledge our Gods! But one day it will be our turn to repress! By the way, what are you doing here?
Reply.scriptResult: CompleteQuestIfTaken('r3m1_FindNative'); CompleteQuestIfTaken('r3m1_FindMoreNative'); if QuestStatus('r3m1_FindMoreNative')==Q_TAKEN then AddHistory( 'r3_Fist_Fight_1' ); AddFadingMsgId( 'fm_history_got' ); else AddHistory( 'r3_v2_Uluk_FirstTime_1' ); AddFadingMsgId( 'fm_history_got' ); end

Reply.name: Uluc_Bar_Customer1_1_P04
Reply.text: I'm looking for the Oracle.

Reply.name: Uluc_Bar_Customer1_1_N05
Reply.text: I can't help you with that. Only the druids know where the secret path to his residence begins.

Reply.name: Uluc_Bar_Customer1_1_P061
Reply.text: So even if I don't like it, I have to go to them.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_002001
Reply.text: Wait a minute! You think they're just going to tell you where their idol lives? Don't even dream of it!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_002002
Reply.text: Do I have any other option?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_002003
Reply.text: Of course you do! Only the High Druid has the right to speak of the Oracle's location, and our elder has a special grudge against him. It seems we can come to an agreement.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_002007
Reply.text: I don't want to hear it! I will never commit treason!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_002004
Reply.text: Go on.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_002005
Reply.text: Try to lure the High Druid out of Set and bring him here. We'll ambush him, catch him, and make him reveal everything he knows about the Oracle!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_002006
Reply.text: What if he realizes it's a lie?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_002008
Reply.text: Trust me, he won't. He's so obsessed with helping other people that he won't even think that you're lying.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_002009
Reply.text: Okay, I'll see what I can do. But if anything goes wrong, you and I have never met and we don't know each other.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_002010
Reply.text: Of course.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_002011
Reply.text: Well, time to go to Set.

Reply.name: Uluc_Bar_Customer1_2_N01
Reply.text: You have been a great help to us. The old druid was the last obstacle to our religion! Now the machines will come into our lives and make it better!

Reply.name: Uluc_Bar_Customer1_2_P02
Reply.text: To tell you the truth, I don't care much about your future plans. What about the location of the Oracle?

Reply.name: Uluc_Bar_Customer1_2_N03
Reply.text: The old man struggled for a long time, but our elder knows how to torture! He finally gave us the location of the secret path that leads to the Oracle. We have enough to do here as it is, but we'll visit him sooner or later!

Reply.name: Uluc_Bar_Customer1_2_P04
Reply.text: I won't detain you any longer. Farewell.

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_5_N01
Reply.text: What's wrong, stranger? You look worried.

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_5_P022
Reply.text: Master, the people of Uluk have a bad plan against you. They have sent me to lure you out of the town!

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_5_N032
Reply.text: You were wise to reveal the plans of the traitors! Come and be a guest in our house!

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_5_P042
Reply.text: I don't like dishonest people. Besides, you have the information I need.

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_5_N052
Reply.text: I wonder what you want to know?

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_5_P062
Reply.text: I'm looking for the Oracle, that's the only reason I came here. Only he can answer my question.

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_5_P021
Reply.text: We were attacked by mechanical monsters! My friend is wounded, he can't move. I left him nearby. Help me!

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_5_N031
Reply.text: Of course I will help you!

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_5_P041
Reply.text: Follow me.

Reply.name: Set_Bar_Customer1_1_N01
Reply.text: Stranger, won't you help the Druid commune?
Reply.scriptCondition: (not IsQuestTaken('r3m1_FindMoreNative')) and (not (IsQuestTaken('r3m1_KnowAboutUluk'))) and not(IsQuestComplete('r3m1_ClearSanctuary_ReturnDruid2')) and not(IsQuestTaken('r3m1_LureMainDriud')) and GetVar('OracleQuickWay').AsInt==0 and GetCurNpc():GetSpokenCount( ) == 0

Reply.name: Set_Bar_Customer2_1_P02
Reply.text: What do you need?

Reply.name: Set_Bar_Customer2_1_N03
Reply.text: We haven't heard from the people of Uluk for a long time. They used to come to our town regularly, but now we haven't heard from them for almost a couple of months. Would you please go and see what's happened there? We'll pay for the work.

Reply.name: Set_Bar_Customer2_1_P042
Reply.text: I have more important things to do.

Reply.name: Set_Bar_Customer2_1_P041
Reply.text: Okay, I'll check it out.

Reply.name: Uluk_Bar_Customer1_3_N01
Reply.text: The guest riding the beast of steel is our friend! What do you want?

Reply.name: Uluk_Bar_Customer1_3_N02
Reply.text: The druids sent me to find out what happened to you. Why have you forgotten your neighbors?

Reply.name: Uluk_Bar_Customer1_3_N03
Reply.text: Excellent, we've been waiting for a messenger from them for a long time! Tell them we no longer need their support and declare holy war against them. Our gods are strong and powerful, and with their help we will crush their dictatorship!

Reply.name: Uluk_Bar_Customer1_3_N04
Reply.text: Okay, I'll tell the druids what you said. It seems to be the only thing I can do.

Reply.name: r3m1_NearUluk_Civilian1_1_N01
Reply.text: Hey, foreigner, listen: the town is dying and the inhabitants are suffering. Not everyone has gone mad, many people are against this change, but they fear the wrath of these monsters. All who could, have gone, but they alone cannot reach Set. I beg you, help these people.

Reply.name: r3m1_NearUluk_Civilian1_1_P02
Reply.text: What about you?

Reply.name: r3m1_NearUluk_Civilian1_1_N03
Reply.text: I'm staying. I need to find out the cause of the mass insanity about machines and persuade the Elder to stop this massacre.

Reply.name: r3m1_NearUluk_Civilian1_1_P042
Reply.text: I was asked to find out what happened, so I did. It was not part of my plan to rescue refugees, do it yourself.

Reply.name: r3m1_NearUluk_Civilian1_1_P041
Reply.text: I will help them. May fortune be with you, too! Goodbye.
Reply.scriptResult: TakeQuest('r3m1_RescueUlukCivil'); TActivate('trWentCivCamp'); SetTolerance(1100,1064,RS_ALLY); SetTolerance(1019,1064,RS_ALLY); GetCurNpc():SetSpokenCount(1); SetVar('BezhenAlive', 0); EndConversation();

Reply.name: Set_Bar_Customer1_2_N01
Reply.text: What happened in Uluk?

Reply.name: Set_Bar_Customer2_2_P022
Reply.text: The elder believed in new gods and now worships metal monsters.

Reply.name: Set_Bar_Customer2_2_N032
Reply.text: That's sad news. However, you have earned your reward. Go in peace.

Reply.name: Set_Bar_Customer2_2_P021
Reply.text: The elder believed in new gods and now worships metal monsters. But these people will tell you about it better then me.

Reply.name: Set_Bar_Customer2_2_N031
Reply.text: You have changed our opinion of foreigners. Take it - it's your reward. If you have to pass through our places again, you can always count on our help!

Reply.name: Set_Bar_Customer2_2_P041
Reply.text: Thank you, too. I'm glad there are still people who live in harmony with nature.

Reply.name: RazVill_Bar_Lisa_1_N01
Reply.text: Oh, you're back already? What's up? What did the Oracle tell you? Do you know what happened to Ivan?

Reply.name: RazVill_Bar_Lisa_1_N02
Reply.text: I didn't get any definite answers, but according to my father's journal, he was going to cross the Desert of Death.

Reply.name: RazVill_Bar_Lisa_1_N03
Reply.text: Oh, my God, what did he get himself into...|What did he want to find there?

Reply.name: RazVill_Bar_Lisa_1_N04
Reply.text: Do you know anything about the land after this desert?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_002192
Reply.text: Only useless old world books. Wait a minute, though, I think I had some of the modern ones. Here. Read it when you have time.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_002193
Reply.text: Do you carry your entire book archive with you?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_002194
Reply.text: No, only favorites. Twenty or thirty books, no more.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_002196
Reply.text: So, what are our next steps?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_002197
Reply.text: I have a blueprint, according to which I need to make shield plates that will protect the cab of my truck from the radiation of the desert.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_002198
Reply.text: Then you must go to Midgard. It's the only place where you'll find masters of sufficient skill.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_002200
Reply.text: There's a bit of a problem with that...

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_002204
Reply.text: Oh, yeah, I heard about the incident at the museum. I can recommend someone who can solve your problem easily.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_002205
Reply.text: And who is that?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_002206
Reply.text: A thief named Salvatore that lives in Small Land. But he takes a lot of money for his services.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_002207
Reply.text: I know him. I've done a couple of jobs for him, so I think we can make a deal.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_002208
Reply.text: That's great. Go alone for now. I'll move out in a day. When you're finished with the blueprint, come to my father, I'll be at his place.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_002209
Reply.text: Okay. Well, I'm off!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_002199
Reply.text: Well, I'm leaving then! Shall we go together or...

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_002201
Reply.text: Go alone for now. I'll move out in a day. When you're finished with the blueprint, come to my father, I'll be at his place.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_002202
Reply.text: Okay. Well, I'm off!

Reply.name: Set_Bar_Druid3_1_N01
Reply.text: You're the stranger who destroyed the robots in our sanctuary!
Reply.scriptCondition: not(IsQuestTaken('q_VisitDruid')) and not(IsQuestComplete('q_VisitDruid')) and IsQuestComplete('r3m1_ClearSanctuary_ReturnDruid2') and GetCurNpc():GetSpokenCount( ) == 0 and not(QuestStatus('r3m2_OracleMemory')==Q_COMPLETED)

Reply.name: Set_Bar_Druid3_1_N02
Reply.text: And you, I suppose, are Druid Fionius. I hear you have work for me.

Reply.name: Set_Bar_Druid3_1_N03
Reply.text: That's right. Five years ago, a friend of mine, just like you, went to the Oracle to look for answers, but he never came back.

Reply.name: Set_Bar_Druid3_1_N04a
Reply.text: I need to find out what happened to him?

Reply.name: Set_Bar_Druid3_1_N05a
Reply.text: Not really. I heard he's settled in a house down by the old road. Can you stop by and give him this parcel? And tell him that his friend Fionius from Set sends his regards.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001998
Reply.text: I'm sorry, I don't have time for your problems right now.

Reply.name: Set_Bar_Druid3_1_N06a
Reply.text: Don't worry. I'll give him both your regards and the package.

Reply.name: Uluk_Hram_Zrec_1_N01
Reply.text: Traveller, I see that you are a good man. Take this book with our story.

Reply.name: Uluk_Hram_Zrec_1_N02
Reply.text: Thank you, but I'm not really interested.

Reply.name: Uluk_Hram_Zrec_1_N03
Reply.text: How rude of you... |Do you know what happens to strangers in this town if they refuse to accept our cult Bible?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_003242
Reply.text: Man, you're either deaf or stupid. I already told you, I'm not interested in your scribblings. Get out of my sight!

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_003243
Reply.text: You shouldn't say that...

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_003244
Reply.text: You asked for it, old man!

Reply.name: Uluk_Hram_Zrec_1_N04
Reply.text: I'm sorry, I didn't mean to offend anyone. Thank you so much for honoring me by talking to me and giving me this wonderful book.

Reply.name: Uluk_Hram_Zrec_1_N05
Reply.text: That's better. You can go.

Reply.name: Uluk_Hram_Zrec_1_N06
Reply.text: Thank you, goodbye.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_003026
Reply.text: Hello, traveler. Would you like to buy a detailed map of the surrounding lands from me? Only 12000 coins.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_003028
Reply.text: Not now.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_003027
Reply.text: Sure. Here's the money.

Reply.name: Aborigen_hellodlg0
Reply.text: You demons! First my crops, and then you want to take me, too! I won't be taken so easily!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000549
Reply.text: Good evening to you, too.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000550
Reply.text: You are one of them, I saw you in the field, in a pillar of flame!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001159
Reply.text: Another harmless lunatic...

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000551
Reply.text: Don't worry, good man, the power of science will drive the demons from your fields. I've seen it before.

Reply.name: SektantMain_hellodlg0
Reply.text: Greetings, lost soul. I see an emptiness and spiritlessness in you. Help our church and you would get back on the right path.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001133
Reply.text: I'm not sure if I need it ... but what exactly do you need?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_001247
Reply.text: The spiritual balance of our flock is disturbed by the presence of two pagans. They are troubling the minds of the common people with their heresy! Kill these two heretics and bring me their heads, in order to save the people from unnecessary agitation and doubts in their faith. You will receive our blessing and a generous reward.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001249
Reply.text: No, I'll manage somehow without your blessing!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001248
Reply.text: I agree to help the church!

Reply.name: SektantMain_hellodlg1
Reply.text: Have you done the errand yet?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001252
Reply.text: I have yet to find heretics.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001251
Reply.text: Yes, here are the heads of the two heretics. No more will they sow confusion in the souls of men.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_001250
Reply.text: This is your reward. Bless you for your future endeavors in the name of our church. May fortune be with you.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001253
Reply.scriptResult: CompleteQuest('r2m2_ReturnHeadsQuest'); RemoveQuestItem('quest_shaman_head1'); RemoveQuestItem('quest_shaman_head2'); AddFadingMsgByStrIdFormatted( 'fm_player_rem_thing', 'quest_shaman_head1'); AddFadingMsgByStrIdFormatted( 'fm_player_rem_thing', 'quest_shaman_head2'); GetCurNpc():SetSpokenCount( 2 ); AddPlayerMoney( 1000 ); EndConversation()

Reply.name: TrashFarmer_hellodlg0
Reply.text: Hey, driver! Could you drop some junk off at the village, it's not far from here. You give this stuff to my friend, and he'll pay you well. I could do it myself, but there's too much work to be done - I've got to keep collecting trophies left over from the bandits' battlefields.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001259
Reply.text: I don't have time to carry your trophies.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001135
Reply.text: It seems like a harmless job. Load up your junk.

Reply.name: TrashFarmer_hellodlg1
Reply.text: Yeah, you brought me that engine. Thank you. Here's your hard-earned coins.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001255
Reply.text: The money is good, of course, but I don't understand why I'm driving back and forth with this broken engine.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_001254
Reply.text: This is business, buddy. I can't just tell you all my secrets.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001256
Reply.text: The case is clearly a dark one.
Reply.scriptResult: CompleteQuest('r2m2_OldDvigatel2_Quest'); RemoveQuestItem('quest_old_digital'); AddFadingMsgByStrIdFormatted( 'fm_player_rem_thing', 'quest_old_digital'); GetCurNpc():SetSpokenCount( 2 ); getObj('TrashFarmer'):SetSpokenCount(2); EndConversation()

Reply.name: TrashFarmer_hellodlg2
Reply.text: You again. What brings you here?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001261
Reply.text: I still don't understand, what was the point of taking the old engine back and forth? Tell me the secret.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_001263
Reply.text: It will cost you a lot of money. For 25000 coins, I will share this information with you.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001260
Reply.text: It's a little pricey. Consider that I didn't ask anything.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001264
Reply.text: Must be a good secret for that money! Tell me about it.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_001262
Reply.text: I collect working vehicle parts that are left on the battlefields and send them to my repairman friend. He sometimes substitutes serviceable parts for the ones I bring him and sends the new parts to me. And I'm selling them for triple price.|Now that you know everything, I have to kill you. Ha-ha-ha, bought it! All right, go in peace, but don't pull the same scam in our region, or you'll be in trouble.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001265
Reply.text: That's clever.

Reply.name: NewMechanik_hellodlg0
Reply.text: And there's the engine I've been waiting for. Here is your reward, stranger.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001137
Reply.text: Easy money.

Reply.name: NewMechanik_hellodlg1
Reply.text: Could you take this engine back to Marezzia? Not for free, of course.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001258
Reply.text: Do you take me for a fool? I'm not going to do this.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001257
Reply.text: I don't care what to do, as long as I get paid.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_002176
Reply.text: Hello again!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_002177
Reply.text: You know, the fact that you're always following me is starting to scare me.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_002178
Reply.text: Don't be scared then.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_002179
Reply.text: Look, you and I have great conversations, of course, but I'm a little out of it right now.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_002180
Reply.text: Oh yeah, you need to shoot the local dictator. What a problem...

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_002181
Reply.text: But I could die in this fight!

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_002182
Reply.text: No, you can't. Believe me, it's not the fight that will kill you.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_002183
Reply.text: Why are you following me? Why are you telling me all this?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_002184
Reply.text: Questions, questions, too many questions! But you can't understand that only you can answer them. Show me your map. Here, go to this place. Then drive carefully along the shore for half a kilometer and turn right into the ravine.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_002185
Reply.text: Hey, wait! Why go there? What is there?
Reply.scriptResult: TakeQuest('MrShlyapa3_Quest'); TActivate('Shlyapa3cin'); TActivate('ShlyapaSpokenCounts'); TDeactivate( 'StoneUralZapret' ); GetCurNpc():SetSpokenCount(1); StartConversation('MrShlyapaEmpty')

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_003299
Reply.text: He disappeared again... This kind of talk is starting to bother me. I hope it's a stress hallucination after all.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_003023
Reply.text: Hello, traveler. Would you like to buy a detailed map of the surrounding lands from me? Only 20000 coins.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_003025
Reply.text: Not now.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_003024
Reply.text: Sure. Here's the money.

Reply.name: RecruiterInAR_hellodlg0
Reply.text: What do you want?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000452
Reply.text: I was told that here I could find work and answers to my questions.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000453
Reply.text: That's possible. And who are you?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000454
Reply.text: I am new here, coming from the east. I have been told much of the exploits of your leader, Axel.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000455
Reply.text: Oh, yes! That's a great man! Nothing is impossible for him.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000456
Reply.text: I would like to shake his hand personally.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000457
Reply.text: It won't work... You know, there are evil people who want him dead. So it's not easy for a mere mortal to see him.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000458
Reply.text: But I've been dreaming about it all my life...

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000459
Reply.text: I said "not easy," not "impossible"! Axel personally awards war heroes. Join our ranks, perform a feat, and you can shake his hand.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000460
Reply.text: Who are you at war with?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000461
Reply.text: With the northerners. They betrayed us in the hour of need; now there is no pity left in our hearts. Axel is leading us to an era of universal prosperity, only wretched neighbors stand in our way. But not for long!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000462
Reply.text: Now I understand what ideals you are fighting for.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000463
Reply.text: Are you with us or against us?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000465
Reply.text: Of course I'm with you. And I'll try to do something outstanding to meet Axel as soon as possible.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000468
Reply.text: Start small. For now, the most important thing for us is not to let the enemy relax for even a moment. Go to the border and attack anything that moves. What you steal is yours. We'll keep in touch by radio.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000469
Reply.text: Got it!
Reply.scriptResult: GetCurNpc():SetSpokenCount( 1 ); TActivate('SNGPROVIANT'); CompleteQuest('d_FindVerbInAR_Quest'); CompleteQuestIfTaken('d_GetSupportOneOfTheBands1_Quest'); FailQuestIfTaken('d_FindVerbInAM_Quest'); FailQuestIfTaken('d_FindVerbInSNG_Quest'); AddHistory( 'r2_AR_00' ); AddFadingMsgId( 'fm_history_got' ); EndConversation()

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000464
Reply.text: Maybe I'll find another way...

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000466
Reply.text: Of course, it's up to you. But our people are simple: they don't like to be disturbed by idle talk.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000467
Reply.text: I understand.

Reply.name: RecruiterInAR_hellodlg1
Reply.text: So are you willing to give your life for the righteous cause of the Crimson Down?

Reply.name: RecruiterInAR_hellodlg2
Reply.text: The operation was more than successful. While you were distracting the enemy, we managed to capture an important strategic object. Get your share of the loot.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000472
Reply.text: It was easy.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000473
Reply.text: It's going to get tougher from here. Now you have to infiltrate into the rear of the enemy and deprive him of supplies. To do this you will have to blow up transports with food and essential goods. What you can take is yours, as usual. Now do it!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000474
Reply.text: Difficulties don't scare me!

Reply.name: RecruiterInAR_hellodlg3
Reply.text: You managed to hit the northerners' economy. The rest is our business.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000476
Reply.text: When will I be able to meet Axel?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000477
Reply.text: You're aiming high. Continue to serve as well as you do, and he will personally give you an award.|Our good friends, the monks, have taken an interest in you. They are doing us an invaluable service, keeping the morale of the soldiers up with prayers... and excellent wine! Go to the monastery and arrange with them for another shipment of drink.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000478
Reply.text: What kind of stupid assignment is this? At a time when there is war all around...

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000479
Reply.text: Do not underestimate the power of faith.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000480
Reply.text: Yes, sir!

Reply.name: RecruiterInAR_hellodlg4
Reply.text: You got held up. Did you bring the wine?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000502
Reply.text: Yes. The barrels are in the car.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000504
Reply.text: That's good. You don't have to say anything. I'm afraid of those monks myself... Well, let's get to the point: we know that there are traitors among us.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000506
Reply.text: Rebels who are disgruntled with the regime. They are corrupting our economy from within. Just as worms slowly kill the bark of a tree, so these pests can weaken our power. We have found out where their camp is. The rebels are not expecting an attack, and you can handle them easily. Your job is to kill them all.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000507
Reply.text: Killing unarmed people... And if I refuse?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000508
Reply.text: Then we will realize that there is another traitor in our ranks.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000509
Reply.text: I will follow our order.

Reply.name: RecruiterInAR_hellodlg5
Reply.text: What was the outcome of the negotiations?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000526
Reply.text: The CIT leaders have agreed to meet me here.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000527
Reply.text: It went too easily. The enemy is treacherous, it could be a trap. Anyway, we'll go there and fight them.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000528
Reply.text: I want to participate in the operation!

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_002143
Reply.text: They say you wanted to meet me? Who are you and what do you want?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_002144
Reply.text: I have identified the traitors plotting a coup to overthrow Axel. Their leader is in the back of my truck.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_002145
Reply.text: A coup, you say... Well, bring him here, let's see if you're telling the truth! I'll interrogate him quickly, and you stay here.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_002146
Reply.text: I sincerely wish to help this country!

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_002153
Reply.text: Maybe so, but you're obviously not from around here. What are your motives?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_002154
Reply.text: I admire your courageous and talented leader Axel and dream of meeting him face to face and shaking his hand!

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_002155
Reply.text: Well, if the man you brought really is the leader of the rebels, Axel will meet you in person and give you a medal for special services to our country.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_002156
Reply.text: I can't wait for this moment!

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_002157
Reply.text: Wait here while I interrogate your prisoner.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_002158
Reply.text: What else is left to do, I'll wait...

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_002147
Reply.text: Good news! The one you brought in really turned out to be the traitor. You did not deceive us with this one.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_002148
Reply.text: This one?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_002149
Reply.text: Never mind. What's more, the great Axel himself didn't ignore your deed and now wants to personally present you with an award. Meet him there.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_002150
Reply.text: Why are we meeting somewhere far away and not in the capital of the country?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_002151
Reply.text: Because there are enemies all around! You have neutralized one traitor, but there could be many more. And only a privileged few know about this place. No more questions! Axel will be there waiting for you!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_002152
Reply.text: That's great.

Reply.name: Monah_hellodlg1
Reply.text: Hello, my son. You have recently performed many glorious acts in the name of our common cause that have not escaped our attention. We decided to get to know you better.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000489
Reply.text: I'm not hiding anything. Ask me all you want.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000493
Reply.text: No questions needed. One look is enough to understand. We test everyone who joins our crusade. That is why we do not know defeat.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000494
Reply.text: And what about me?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000495
Reply.text: We sre having some doubts: you're bringing big changes with you. Some people are suggesting that you should be killed right now. But I think you should live. In other words, opinions are divided.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000496
Reply.text: Is there anything I can do to influence these opinions?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000497
Reply.text: Yes. A wanderer came to us and said that he knew you very well. That your village has recently been attacked and you crave revenge on all the bandits, and you fight on our side only to get to our God-blessed leader and kill him!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000498
Reply.text: What? No, that's a lie! I... I do want to see Axel, but only because...

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_002186
Reply.text: Leave those empty words, they are of no use to us. Let God judge you in the Arena! Whoever wins will be right. I'll watch you fight from my cell window! Now go!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_002187
Reply.text: Whoever he is, I will kill him! Who is my enemy?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_002188
Reply.text: Old Man Felix.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_002189
Reply.text: What?! Felix?!

Reply.name: Monah_hellodlg2
Reply.text: You've proved your point. You can go back, and don't forget the wine.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000500
Reply.text: Yes, of course... I came for the wine after all...|I'm still wondering why you decided to give me a chance?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_002190
Reply.text: Because our mission is much more important than the squabble for power in this region. And so is yours...

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_002191
Reply.text: It's nice to deal not with fanatics, but with people.

Reply.name: Monah_hellodlg3
Reply.text: The voice of God has brought you to our monastery.

Reply.name: Mopl_he
Reply.text: I know you have Lisa! Give her to me or I'll destroy your monastery to pieces!

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000538
Reply.text: We are not your enemies. Do not disturb us with your loud speeches.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_002171
Reply.text: Now shut up and listen carefully: Axel personally gave me the go-ahead to look for Lisa, and your refusal is now considered a state crime!

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_002172
Reply.text: Don't anger the gods, we don't have her! When she learned that the war would soon be over, she hurriedly packed her things and left.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_002173
Reply.text: Do you know where?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_002174
Reply.text: She said something about a power plant in Librium. And there's only one power plant there, the town of Sel.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_002175
Reply.text: Sel, you say... Well, now she can't hide from me!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000539
Reply.text: With Axel's failure, your power is over. If I won't, the others will burn this place down. I'm gonna count to three and start the attack. One... Two...

Reply.name: LagerGuardian_hellodlg0
Reply.text: Who are you, stranger, and what do you want?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_002133
Reply.text: I was sent from the CIT to get you out of enemy territory.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_002134
Reply.text: Wonderful news! We must hurry, because the Crimson Dawn has put a huge bounty on my head! Axel's cutthroats are about to arrive in any minute!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_002136
Reply.text: [A huge bounty... So if I take him to CD Headquarters, not only will I get paid, but a medal as well? And then I could meet Axel and ask him about Lisa!]

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_002137
Reply.text: Come on, let's go! What's the holdup?!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_002138
Reply.text: Yeah, yeah, we're on our way! You know, why don't you get in the back?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_002139
Reply.text: What's that for?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_002140
Reply.text: So you won't be spotted by Axel's mercenaries when I pass near them! Do you even want to live or not?!

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_002141
Reply.text: Oh, okay, fine.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_002142
Reply.text: [That's good. Now to Marezzia! I'm sure they'll be pleased with my gift.]
Reply.scriptResult: FailQuestIfTaken('d_MeetLeaderGelvetcia_Quest'); FailQuestIfTaken('Shpion1_Quest'); TakeQuest('r2m2_BetrateAMorSNG'); GetCurNpc():SetSpokenCount( 1 ); TActivate('MarezziaOpen'); SetTolerance(1100,1015,RS_NEUTRAL); AddQuestItem('SNGSpy_P'); AddFadingMsgByStrIdFormatted( 'fm_player_add_poput', 'SNGSpy_P'); EndConversation()

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_002135
Reply.text: Then there's no time to talk! Hurry up and hop in my truck!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000511
Reply.text: I will execute the traitors of Axel's cause!

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000512
Reply.text: We don't want to hurt anyone! We are fighting for a just cause. Have mercy! We have families at home...

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000514
Reply.text: I'm not a murderer, it's just life circumstances... Run before it's too late.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000515
Reply.text: Thank you! We will go to Librium, but I have valuable information that must be forwarded urgently to the leadership of the Independent Towns.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000516
Reply.text: I no longer belong in the Crimson Dawn. I am a fugitive now too. Get in, I'll take you to your allies.
Reply.scriptResult: FailQuest( 'r2m2_ToKillAllSNGPeople' ); TActivate('LAGERNOWAR'); GetCurNpc():SetSpokenCount( 1 ); AddQuestItem('SNGSpy_P'); AddFadingMsgByStrIdFormatted( 'fm_player_add_poput', 'SNGSpy_P'); EndConversation()

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000513
Reply.text: Die in the name of the Crimson Dawn!

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_002291
Reply.text: Thank you so much! A few more minutes and they would have gotten to me!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_002292
Reply.text: I was sent by the anti-militarists. Their leaders are very interested in keeping you alive.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_002293
Reply.text: Wonderful news! We must hurry, because the Crimson Dawn has put a huge bounty on my head! Axel's cutthroats are about to arrive at this hideout in any minute!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_002294
Reply.text: Then there's no time to talk! Hurry up and hop in my truck!

Reply.name: Agent_hellodlg0
Reply.text: The night is long...

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000520
Reply.text: But the dawn is near. We have the most important information about the operation against the Independent Towns.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000521
Reply.text: We are willing to help you in exchange for information you can provide.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000522
Reply.text: This information is too important to entrust to a mere agent. There are traitors everywhere: I can only trust the most important people. What I know will decide the outcome of the war!

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000523
Reply.text: We have expected such an outcome. Our leaders will be waiting for you here.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000524
Reply.text: I will get there immediately.

Reply.name: Agent_hellodlg1
Reply.text: I don't remember you.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000542
Reply.text: The night is long.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000543
Reply.text: But the dawn is near. Hello, comrade!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000544
Reply.text: I came to discuss plans for cooperation.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000546
Reply.text: Thank God you showed up. But it's not safe here. The meeting is at this location in five minutes. Our leader will answer all your questions there. Good luck.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000547
Reply.text: The tyrant will be defeated.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_002159
Reply.text: The night is long...

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_002160
Reply.text: Come on, the whole country is in shambles, are we still playing this game?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_002161
Reply.text: I don't know what you're talking about.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_002162
Reply.text: But the dawn is near.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_002163
Reply.text: You could have said that right off the bat. The country is indeed in shambles, most of the soldiers have left their posts and surrendered, but Axel himself has left his secret city and taken up defenses in the arena near the monastery with his best fighters.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_002164
Reply.text: So I have to kill his guards to get to him?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_002165
Reply.text: I don't see any other option. Be careful.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_002166
Reply.text: I will. Now it's time for me to put an end to this war!
Reply.scriptResult: CompleteQuestIfTaken( 'r2m2_MoveToZeonToAlex' ); CompleteQuestIfTaken( 'd_GetAkselBandit_Quest' ); TakeQuest( 'r2m2_FightWithAxelInArena_Quest' ); TActivate('AXELARENA'); TActivate('OhranaAxel'); EndConversation()

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_002307
Reply.text: How can I help you?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_002308
Reply.text: The old pig was breeding gilts.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_002309
Reply.text: I've been waiting for you. I was told to give you the coordinates of a man who has been actively fighting the dictatorship of the Church of Enlightment for several years. Good luck.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_002310
Reply.text: The enemy will be defeated.

Reply.name: Axel_hellodlg0
Reply.text: There you are! You did so much for our victory over the enemy, and for that your name will be immortalized forever in our history! And now accept from me this medal for special services.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000530
Reply.text: Thanks, I really appreciate it, but I actually had a slightly different goal in mind.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000531
Reply.text: Well, well, well... Interesting...|And what do you want?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000532
Reply.text: I want to ask you a question...

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_002167
Reply.text: A question! You must be a very brave guy to come in here and dare to ask me questions! I like you, but I won't tell you anything for nothing! Show me what you're worth in a fight!

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_002169
Reply.text: There is an arena behind the monastery: we will fight one-on-one. If you survive, you will ask your question.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_002170
Reply.text: Well, since there's no other way...|To the arena!
Reply.scriptResult: CompleteQuestIfTaken( 'r2m2_MoveToZeonToAlex' ); CompleteQuestIfTaken( 'd_GetAkselBandit_Quest' ); TakeQuest( 'r2m2_FightWithAxelInArena_Quest' ); TActivate('AXELARENA'); AddQuestItem('quest_crimson_medal'); AddFadingMsgByStrIdFormatted( 'fm_player_add_thing', 'quest_crimson_medal'); EndConversation()

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_002315
Reply.text: Do you want something?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_002317
Reply.text: The heretic says it's time for action.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_002318
Reply.text: Finally! How long we've been preparing for this! Does Astria know?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_002319
Reply.text: Soon it will.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_002316
Reply.text: What do you want?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_002320
Reply.text: The heretic says it's time for action.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_002321
Reply.text: Great news! To arms, brothers! We'll meet at the entrance to the monastery.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_002322
Reply.text: Got it.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_002323
Reply.text: So you all know what to do! Shoot only at the enemy. Leave the civilians and ordinary monks alone. Now set course for the monastery! Go!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_002324
Reply.text: Let's go!

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_002325
Reply.text: Take your time, I have another assignment for you.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_002326
Reply.text: I'm listening.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_002327
Reply.text: Axel is not in the monastery. Trusted sources tell us that he and his guards are hiding in the arena behind the monastery. Go there and do what you think is right.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_002328
Reply.text: Will do.
Reply.scriptResult: CompleteQuest('Eretik_Meet'); TActivate('AXELARENA'); TakeQuest( 'r2m2_FightWithAxelInArena_Quest' ); TActivate('OhranaAxel'); TActivate('EretOff'); AddHistory( 'r2_Before_Axel_00' ); AddFadingMsgId( 'fm_history_got' ); GetPlayerVehicle():SetCustomLinearVelocity(0); GetPlayerVehicle():SetThrottle(0); EndConversation()

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_002329
Reply.text: Have you done it yet? That's great. We didn't waste any time here either, now the war is officially over.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_002330
Reply.text: Wonderful news. Now if you'll excuse me, I have an urgent need to speak to one of the monks.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_002331
Reply.text: Of course, be our guest, none of the civilians were hurt.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_002332
Reply.text: You. I want answers. Do you know a girl named Lisa?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_002333
Reply.text: Please don't kill me!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_002334
Reply.text: Answer the question! Do you know Lisa?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_002335
Reply.text: Y-yes sir, I know her.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_002336
Reply.text: Where is she?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_002337
Reply.text: She left Argen this morning. She said she had something to pick up in Helvetia.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_002338
Reply.text: Helvetia, huh? Are you sure?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_002339
Reply.text: That's right, sir! Helvetia!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_002340
Reply.text: All right, thanks for the information. Don't be rude to these gentlemen, and no one will kill you. And I need to discuss further plans with the headquarters.
Reply.scriptResult: CompleteQuest('r2m2_ToLisaToMonastir'); TakeQuest('ReturnQuest'); SetTolerance(1100,1017,RS_ALLY); SetTolerance(1100,1015,RS_ALLY); SetTolerance(1100, 1043, RS_ALLY); SetTolerance(1100,1016,RS_ENEMY); TActivate('MarezziaOpen'); EndConversation()

Reply.name: Estet_hellodlg0
Reply.text: Would you like to make some money? I could use your skills.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001110
Reply.text: What's the job?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_001119
Reply.text: A couple of days ago there was a robbery at my house. The thieves took something very precious to me. The thing is that it is a very specific object - a masterpiece of world art. Only a true antique connoisseur can go for such a crime. And besides myself, I know only one such person.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001121
Reply.text: I'll pass, it's too much work.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001120
Reply.text: Deal. What does this "masterpiece" of yours look like? And where does the guy you suspect live?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_002553
Reply.text: A green jewelry box with a gold frame. And he lives in the village of Razdolnoe, not far from here.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_002554
Reply.text: Got it. I'll take care of it.

Reply.name: Estet_hellodlg1
Reply.text: Oh, you brought me a masterpiece of world art! Give it to me and take your money...

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001122
Reply.text: Maybe I can find a better place for this masterpiece.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001116
Reply.text: Here's your precious.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001111
Reply.text: Tell me right away, did you steal a masterpiece of world art from Aesthete?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_001124
Reply.text: Yes, but... I'm very sorry, but I don't have it. I was recently approached by a crook and offered to steal a masterpiece for me. We made a plan together to get into Aesthete's place. I paid him an advance, and I never saw the man again. I am very, very sorry that I got involved with a criminal. But I wanted to get my hands on such a beauty... Perhaps you can find the man who tricked us both. He called himself Rogue. I met him in a little canyon not far from here. He might still be there.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001125
Reply.text: Don't worry, I'll find him. And if you have lied, I will come back for you.

Reply.name: AntipodEstet_hellodlg1
Reply.text: Do you have the masterpiece of world art?! Give it to me! I'll thank you generously...

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001123
Reply.text: No, I'll keep it for now.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001118
Reply.text: Here it is. Now give me my money.

Reply.name: Gulik_hellodlg0
Reply.text: My sources inform me that a rich transport will pass almost unguarded to the south. It's a sure thing. I get you information, you get me half the loot. Deal?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_001126
Reply.text: I'll wait for you here with the loot.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001128
Reply.text: I'll be back soon.

Reply.name: Gulik_hellodlg1
Reply.text: What's that? Why did you bring it here?! Are you trying to kill us?! Take it off the table right now!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001112
Reply.text: What do you mean "take it off"? I took the packages from the caravan, brought them to you, and am waiting for the reward, as agreed!

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_001130
Reply.text: Oh, my God, you have no idea how badly you and I are in trouble... You see this stamp? That's Sledgehammer's seal. Those who steal from Sledgehammer don't live long!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001131
Reply.text: Who's a "Sledgehammer"?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_002710
Reply.text: A local drug dealer who rose up during the war when the country was in shambles. Like all drug dealers, he knows no limits in his cruelty and kills even those who answer him wrong. And we robbed his caravan...

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_002711
Reply.text: Yeah, it's a lousy situation. So we'll have to be proactive. Do you know where he might be right now?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_002870
Reply.text: I know he has a dwelling by the sea, near the rock, right here, but I can't guarantee you that he's there right now.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_002872
Reply.text: Well, no, I'm certainly not going to make it worse by attacking him. We'll just have to hope he doesn't get to us.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_002871
Reply.text: All right, I'll check it out. If I find him there, I'll kill him. If not, let's hope he doesn't find us.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_002537
Reply.text: Well, what's your excuse?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_002538
Reply.text: You again! What do you mean by "what excuse?"

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_002539
Reply.text: Why did you even come here? Seriously, why? How did you know there was room under the rock? You took a big risk, diving into the water like that.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_002540
Reply.text: Well I... Hm-m...

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_002541
Reply.text: You don't even have an answer. I see. Think about it when you get time. And now I gotta go.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_002542
Reply.text: And really, what the hell brought me here?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_002551
Reply.text: I can't believe it! Aliens! They're real!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_002552
Reply.text: I know what you feel, until recently I thought it was all fiction myself.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_002548
Reply.text: Well, now my colleagues will have to acknowledge the scientific weight of my research in this area! Thank you again for telling me about all these signs. Without your help I wouldn't have been able to go that far.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_002575
Reply.text: You're welcome. Good luck with your further research.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_003020
Reply.text: Hello, traveler. Would you like to buy a detailed map of the surrounding lands from me? Only 20000 coins.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_003022
Reply.text: Not now.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_003021
Reply.text: Sure. Here's the money.

Reply.name: SelCitizen_hellodlg0
Reply.text: What would you like, liberator?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000448
Reply.text: Was Lisa here?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000449
Reply.text: Yes, master. She headed toward Helvetia in great haste.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000450
Reply.text: She's not going anywhere from me now!

Reply.name: SelCitizen_hellodlg1
Reply.text: I am busy with important organizational issues.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000642
Reply.text: My case is urgent. You must shut down the power plant! The fate of mankind depends on you!

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000648
Reply.text: Do you understand what you're asking for? This power plant powers several cities. I'm not going to leave people without heat and light for some crazy idea.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000649
Reply.text: Do you realize that your station also supplies the alien invaders base?!

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000643
Reply.text: I don't understand you. However, recently there have been more and more cases of energy leaks... But that doesn't change my mind!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_002556
Reply.text: Well, I guess you don't fully understand who's standing in front of you. Maybe I should refresh your memory and call the CD leaders here and tell them that you are obstructing me and thereby undermining the security of the region! Which part of your body do you think these guys will cut off first?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_002559
Reply.text: All right, all right, don't call anyone, I don't want any trouble. There, you see, that's it, the power's out.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_002560
Reply.text: There you go. Now get out of here.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_002555
Reply.text: Well, I guess you don't fully understand who's standing in front of you. Maybe I should refresh your memory and call the CIT leaders here? They will be very surprised that you can't turn off the power for a few minutes when the safety of mankind is at stake!

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_002557
Reply.text: How do you imagine it? A few minutes. It will take at least 24 hours to restart the station after the emergency shutdown. However, it's just time for preventive maintenance. All right, go find your aliens.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_002558
Reply.text: You did an invaluable service to the world!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000645
Reply.text: Well, I guess you don't fully understand who's standing in front of you. Maybe I should refresh your memory and call the anti-militarist's leaders here? They will be very surprised that you can't turn off the power for a few minutes when the safety of mankind is at stake!

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000647
Reply.text: How do you imagine it? A few minutes. It will take at least 24 hours to restart the station after the emergency shutdown. However, it's just time for preventive maintenance. All right, go find your aliens.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000651
Reply.text: You did an invaluable service to the world!

Reply.name: SelBarmen_hellodlg0
Reply.text: I haven't seen you here before.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz471
Reply.text: This is the first time I've been to your place. I had to cross the mountains to get here.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz472
Reply.text: If you could get through the tunnel, you must be a talented fighter. Or have you decided to become a mercenary and come as a result of an agreement with a recruiter?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz473
Reply.text: It's more like the first one. I don't know much about this country and I don't want to get involved in conflicts.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz474
Reply.text: What a miracle! Does anyone else come to our lands not to kill for money?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz475
Reply.text: Live and let others live, that's what I was taught.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz476
Reply.text: But you have to choose a side. Here you are either a friend or an enemy! Unless, of course, you're going to join those clowns who promote peace and love.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz477
Reply.text: What clowns?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz478
Reply.text: There's a bunch of guys who have been doing anti-propaganda and undermining our morale lately. They say no one needs the war, so we have to end it. In a word - fools. I heard they've settled somewhere in the north, but that's more drunken speculation than truth.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz479
Reply.text: I see. Anyway, it doesn't matter; in any case, I have to understand the war here before I choose a side.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz480
Reply.text: You know, you should go to Tuzz. They'll tell you everything you need to know about the invaders. And they'll help you find them.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz481
Reply.text: I'll think about what you said.
Reply.scriptResult: GetCurNpc():SetSpokenCount( 1 ); CompleteQuest('FigureOutWhatsGoingOn_Quest'); TakeQuest('d_GetSupportOneOfTheBands1_Quest'); TakeQuest('d_FindVerbInAR_Quest'); TakeQuest('d_FindVerbInSNG_Quest'); TakeQuest('d_FindVerbInAM_Quest'); AddBook('r1_book_sng_flyer'); EndConversation()

Reply.name: TuzVerb_hellodlg0
Reply.text: Are you ready to join our army?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz483
Reply.text: Tell me what you are fighting for?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz484
Reply.text: For good and justice against the evil beast invaders!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz485
Reply.text: I've heard that somewhere before. I'll go look elsewhere for answers.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz486
Reply.text: Wait. Take this booklet and read it. Maybe when you learn the history of this country, your heart will tell you what to do next.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz487
Reply.text: All right, I'll read it. |...What is written in the booklet is really awful. But what does that have to do with me?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz488
Reply.text: We need every man who can fight back against the enemy. I must say, the situation is very difficult. And we will be grateful for all the help we can get.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz489
Reply.text: Frankly, I came to your region to have a proper talk with Axel, and in this our interests are the same.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz490
Reply.text: Join our army! Together we stand a better chance. Especially since it's almost impossible to get close to him just like that. We have sent assassins to him, but none of them have succeeded.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz491
Reply.text: Why? What was stopping them?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz492
Reply.text: Besides the fact that Axel always travels with heavy security, that between him and us lies a hostile country full of heavily armed thugs?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz493
Reply.text: Yeah, besides that.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz494
Reply.text: No one knows exactly where his hideout is. They say he turned an underground base into a garden city, but so far we haven't been able to find out its exact location. Yet. So you're with us?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz496
Reply.text: Together we will crush Axel's tyranny!

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz499
Reply.text: Thank you, stranger. Be assured that your doings will not be forgotten.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz500
Reply.text: When do I start my service?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz501
Reply.text: Immediately. Go patrol the border. No enemy scouts are to enter our territory.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz502
Reply.text: I'm leaving right now!
Reply.scriptResult: GetCurNpc():SetSpokenCount( 1 ); TakeQuest('d_FindVerbInSNG_Quest'); CompleteQuest('d_FindVerbInSNG_Quest'); CompleteQuestIfTaken('d_GetSupportOneOfTheBands1_Quest'); FailQuestIfTaken('d_FindVerbInAM_Quest'); TDeactivate('trOCFERolik_Begin'); FailQuestIfTaken('d_FindVerbInAR_Quest'); TActivate ('SERCHSIDELINE'); AddHistory( 'r2_SNG_00' ); AddFadingMsgId( 'fm_history_got' ); SetTolerance( 1100, 1016, RS_ALLY ); SetTolerance( 1100, 1015, RS_ENEMY ); SetTolerance( 1100, 1083, RS_ENEMY ); TakeQuest('d_PatrulSideSNG_Quest'); EndConversation()

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz495
Reply.text: I have to think about it...

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz497
Reply.text: Of course, you are free to leave at any time, unlike the locals...

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz498
Reply.text: Don't push your pity. I have my own head on my shoulders.

Reply.name: TuzVerb_hellodlg1
Reply.text: Are you ready to join our ranks?

Reply.name: TuzVerb_hellodlg2
Reply.text: People owe their lives to you! You really are a fearless warrior. I'm sorry we didn't send you on a real mission right away, but we needed to test you to see what you are capable of.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz504
Reply.text: Now you know it. I would do anything to get to Axel.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz505
Reply.text: Keep it up, and you'll get that opportunity. In the meantime, the common people need your protection. We need to send humanitarian aid shipments to villages from time to time to keep the level of life. Your job is to protect the transport!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz506
Reply.text: I've done this kind of work before. It's a piece of cake.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz507
Reply.text: Don't relax! The enemy will make every effort to leave us without the essentials.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz508
Reply.text: I can do it, don't worry!

Reply.name: TuzVerb_hellodlg3
Reply.text: Thanks to you, we can hold out for a while longer. The time for a decisive actions is approaching.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz510
Reply.text: I certainly enjoy doing good things, but don't forget the main goal!

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz511
Reply.text: Our enemies are supported from behind the mountains. If we finally manage to close the tunnel, it will cause considerable damage to the Axel's regime.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz512
Reply.text: Why hasn't it been done until now? After all, the tunnel is in your territory?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz513
Reply.text: Believe me, we had higher priorities: the war is not carried out with weapons alone. Now it's time to close off this artery. Remember, the tunnel is guarded by elite soldiers...

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz514
Reply.text: They are not elite. I easily defeated one of them in a duel.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz515
